name: U.Z.P.S.
description:
Objective:

Deliver gifts within the time period while sledding down hill at break neck speeds. Running out of time is a GG.

Controls:

  • AD / Left & Right = Steering
  • WS / Up & Down = Tilting

Note:

If performance in browser isnt great, its likely because of lack of optimization + webgl base performance. Playing in a standalone build will always be more performant.
